name: Ctrl/Esc
description:
____________________________________________________

FINAL UPDATE NOW LIVE! THANK YOU!

____________________________________________________


«During the summer vacation, a maintenance technician is hired by the Pandora School of Engineering and Technology to repair and calibrate the equipment that was damaged. However, after making a mistake and making the light go down, strange events begin to happen in the deserted school. Now, the technician's goal is to discover the cause of the apparent haunt and stop it before it gets in danger.»

____________________________________________________

«Hello, human. Please don’t be afraid.»

In Ctrl/Esc, you take the role of a maintenance technician, fixing techonlogical problems in a school, while exploring all the rooms and corridors.

____________________________________________________

____________________________________________________

This is a survival game made for a game design school project (so there might be bugs!).  By completing different tasks and exploring the school, you will learn more about the origin of the strange events that haunt you, with the help of different papers scattered around the  school.

With two possible endings, play through the whole story in around 1 hour.

Warning: Small flashing lights

____________________________________________________

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movement

E - Interact

F - Flashlight

L.Shift - Sprint

Esc - Open the smartphone

Mouse - Control the camera and interact with the menus and tasks
